alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Madison, central Lanier, Lowndes, Thomas, Brooks and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Coolidge to 6 miles northwest of Quitman to near I-75 At Exit 16 to Du Pont. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. At 1235 PM EDT, the Moultrie Airport measured a wind gust of 31 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Thomasville, Lake Park, Lakeland, Quitman, Hahira, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Barwick, Barretts, Dillon, Everett and Pinetta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
